description: Bootstrap v3.2.0 dropdown component implementation, defining the Dropdown class, its methods, event handlers, and plugin setup.

classes.name: Dropdown
classes.description: Class representing the dropdown component with toggle and keydown methods.

methods.name: Dropdown.prototype.toggle
methods.description: Handles the toggling of the dropdown menu on click.

methods.name: Dropdown.prototype.keydown
methods.description: Handles keyboard navigation within the dropdown menu.
